title: Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture Schedule, Second Floor", 1937–38
medium: Graphite, red and blue color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite and red color pencil, upper center: FURNITURE SCHEDULE ANDERSON HOUSE; in blue color pencil, upper left: SECOND FLOOR; description, materials, notes in graphite
description: Furniture schedule for second floor, detailing room, piece, drawing number, quantity, size, woods, finish, interiors, hardware, upholstery specimans and yardage, fabrics, glass mirror, lighting electrical, and remarks.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Harold S. Anderson House: Furniture Schedule, Second Floor", 1937–38.
1937–38. Graphite, red and blue color pencil, and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-635.
